headline: T-Mobile to acquire Vistar Media for $600 Million to bolster advertising business
summary: T-Mobile US said on Monday it has agreed to acquire Vistar Media, a real-time outdoor advertising technology provider, for about $600 million, in an all-cash deal. The deal would...
